HERO.TITLE: Welcome to Tabiiyn Institute
HERO.SUBTITLE: Your trusted educational destination for learning Arabic, Quran, and Islamic Studies, through specialized programs delivered via a sophisticated global platform.
HERO.DESCRIPTION: We offer a unique educational experience that combines academic quality with digital flexibility, under the supervision of elite specialized teachers, to provide our students from around the world with the opportunity to learn in a modern, enjoyable, and comprehensive manner that suits their individual needs and different levels.
HERO.FOOTER: At Tabiiyn Institute, we don't just teach... we bring language and values to life in hearts. üåçüìö

ADVANTAGES.TITLE: Advantages of Studying at Our Institute
ITEMS: Individual and group courses available
Flexible scheduling for individual sessions
Use of modern technology in teaching and information presentation
Providing an enjoyable environment in children's circles with artistic activities to reinforce learning
Focus on psychological aspects and consideration of individual differences among students
We have an exceptional group of specialized Al-Azhar teachers
Support groups for communication between students and their teachers
Continuous communication with parents to achieve the best benefit for the child
Issuing certified certificates at the end of each course
Teaching Quran Tajweed for beginners through easy methods and simplified curricula suitable for everyone

OBJECTIVES.TITLE: Objectives
ITEMS: Teaching Arabic language and proper reading rules
Teaching children Arabic and Tajweed in an easy way to instill love for their language and attachment to the Holy Quran
Creating a means to preserve the identity of our Arab children in foreign countries through their communication with us and receiving language and Quran sciences
Contributing to helping non-Arabic speakers learn and master Quran recitation
Helping parents in memorizing the Holy Quran for their children with proper Tajweed rules and correct pronunciation
Providing an easy way to learn and memorize through online lectures
Encouraging students to form study groups to motivate them to study and excel
Providing psychological support to our students to help them continue and maintain their religious identity
Online Quran memorization for residents in non-Muslim countries and helping them obtain online certification in Quran recitation
Raising awareness about the importance and virtue of learning Quran Tajweed, which some scholars consider obligatory for every Muslim

COURSES.TITLE: Our Educational Programs
COURSES.SUBTITLE: We offer a comprehensive package of specialized educational programs that respect individual differences

HERO.TITLE: Arabic Language Program for Non-Native Speakers
HERO.SUBTITLE: We adopt a comprehensive and adaptive approach to teaching Arabic, where we don't follow a single curriculum, but rather build together a customized roadmap that matches the student's level and allows them to progress either methodically or in a fast and focused way according to their needs and goals.

METHODOLOGY.TITLE: Teaching Methodology
METHODOLOGY.DESCRIPTION: We adopt a comprehensive and adaptive approach to teaching Arabic, where we don't follow a single curriculum, but rather build together a customized roadmap that matches the student's level.

CUSTOMIZED.TITLE: Customized Learning Path
CUSTOMIZED.DESCRIPTION: A personalized roadmap that matches your level and allows you to progress at your own pace.

PACE.TITLE: Flexible Pace
PACE.DESCRIPTION: Progress either methodically or in a fast and focused way according to your needs and goals.

AGE_GROUPS.TITLE: Age Groups
AGE_GROUPS.DESCRIPTION: We start teaching from age 4 and welcome all age groups and different levels.

LEARNING_PATH.TITLE: Learning Path
LEARNING_PATH.DESCRIPTION: We pay special attention to beginners at the preparatory level, starting with teaching letters and recognition, then gradually moving to reading and writing, and with mastery, we advance to higher levels.

LETTERS.TITLE: Letters & Recognition
LETTERS.DESCRIPTION: Start with teaching Arabic letters and their recognition, building a strong foundation.

READING.TITLE: Reading & Writing
READING.DESCRIPTION: Gradually progress to reading and writing skills with proper guidance.

ADVANCED.TITLE: Advanced Levels
ADVANCED.DESCRIPTION: Advance to higher levels with mastery of fundamental skills.

INTERACTIVE.TITLE: Interactive Learning
INTERACTIVE.DESCRIPTION: Engage in dynamic learning sessions with qualified teachers and modern teaching methods.

COMMUNITY.TITLE: Community Support
COMMUNITY.DESCRIPTION: Join a supportive community of learners and practice partners from around the world.

PROGRESS.TITLE: Progress Tracking
PROGRESS.DESCRIPTION: Regular assessments and progress reports to ensure steady improvement in your Arabic skills.

QURAN.TITLE: Quran Program
QURAN.SUBTITLE: A comprehensive program for learning and memorizing the Holy Quran

HERO.TITLE: Master the Noble Quran
HERO.SUBTITLE: Journey through the divine revelation with expert guidance. Our comprehensive Quran courses combine tajweed, tafsir, and memorization techniques.

TAJWEED.TITLE: Tajweed Mastery
TAJWEED.DESCRIPTION: Learn proper pronunciation and recitation with expert guidance

TAFSIR.TITLE: Tafsir Studies
TAFSIR.DESCRIPTION: Understand the deeper meaning behind the divine verses

COMMUNITY.TITLE: Global Community
COMMUNITY.DESCRIPTION: Join learners from around the world on this sacred journey

OVERVIEW.TITLE: Your Journey Through the Noble Quran
OVERVIEW.DESCRIPTION: Our comprehensive curriculum is designed to take you from foundational recitation to deep understanding of the Quranic message, suitable for all levels of learners.

STRUCTURE.TITLE: Structured Learning Path
STRUCTURE.DESCRIPTION: Follow our carefully designed curriculum that gradually builds your knowledge and skills from basics to advanced concepts.

TAJWEED.TITLE: Perfect Tajweed
TAJWEED.DESCRIPTION: Master proper pronunciation and recitation rules with our specialized training techniques and personalized feedback.

TAFSIR.TITLE: Deep Tafsir Understanding
TAFSIR.DESCRIPTION: Gain insights into the meanings, context, and wisdom behind Quranic verses with our detailed explanations.

MEMORIZATION.TITLE: Memorization Techniques
MEMORIZATION.DESCRIPTION: Learn proven methods to memorize the Quran effectively and retain what you've learned long-term.

COMMUNITY.TITLE: Community Support
COMMUNITY.DESCRIPTION: Join a global community of learners for mutual encouragement, practice partners, and shared wisdom.

APPLICATION.TITLE: Practical Application
APPLICATION.DESCRIPTION: Learn how to apply Quranic teachings in daily life with practical examples and guidance.

1.TITLE: Fundamentals of Quran Recitation
1.DESCRIPTION: Arabic alphabet, basic pronunciation, and introductory tajweed rules

2.TITLE: Tajweed Rules in Depth
2.DESCRIPTION: Comprehensive study of proper articulation points and essential rules

3.TITLE: Tafsir Methodology
3.DESCRIPTION: Understanding the sciences of Quranic interpretation and context

READING.TITLE: Reading Program
READING.DESCRIPTION: For students who are not proficient in reading, we start with specialized educational books such as Noor Al-Bayan, Fath Al-Rahman, or Al-Qaida Al-Baghdadiyah, which aim to enable them to read the Holy Quran correctly.

METHODS.TITLE: Teaching Methods
METHODS.NOOR_ALBAYAN: A comprehensive method for teaching Arabic reading and Quran recitation
METHODS.FATH_ALRAHMAN: A systematic approach to learning Quranic reading with proper tajweed
METHODS.BAGHDADI: Traditional method focusing on Arabic letters and their proper pronunciation

MEMORIZATION.TITLE: Memorization Program
MEMORIZATION.DESCRIPTION: We start with children who are unable to read by memorizing the Holy Quran, using methods such as dictation, understanding meanings, and simplified word interpretation, which enhances the retention of verses in the child's memory.

METHODS.TITLE: Learning Methods
METHODS.DICTATION_DESC: Writing and repeating verses to strengthen memory
METHODS.MEANING_DESC: Learning the meaning of verses to enhance comprehension
METHODS.SIMPLIFIED_DESC: Age-appropriate explanation of Quranic words and concepts

PERSONALIZED.TITLE: Personalized Learning
PERSONALIZED.DESCRIPTION: Customized learning plans based on each student's level and needs

INTERACTIVE.TITLE: Interactive Sessions
INTERACTIVE.DESCRIPTION: Engaging one-on-one sessions with qualified teachers

PROGRESS.TITLE: Progress Tracking
PROGRESS.DESCRIPTION: Regular assessments and progress reports to ensure steady improvement

HERO.TITLE: Islamic Studies Program
HERO.SUBTITLE: A comprehensive and diverse program covering all age groups (males and females), designed to provide a deep understanding of Islamic knowledge and values.

OVERVIEW.TITLE: Your Journey Through Islamic Knowledge
OVERVIEW.DESCRIPTION: Our comprehensive curriculum is designed to take you from foundational concepts to deep understanding of Islamic sciences, suitable for all levels of learners.

SEERAH.TITLE: Prophetic Biography
SEERAH.DESCRIPTION: Presenting the biography of the Prophet Ô∑∫ supported by images and stories, explained in a simplified manner suitable for children.

MOTHERS.TITLE: Mothers of Believers
MOTHERS.DESCRIPTION: For young and older girls, presented in an engaging style that instills recognition of female role models in Islam and encourages emulation of their virtues.

ETIQUETTE.TITLE: Islamic Etiquette
ETIQUETTE.DESCRIPTION: Learn the proper Islamic manners and behaviors for daily life.

EATING.TITLE: Eating & Drinking
EATING.DESCRIPTION: Proper manners for consuming food and drink according to Islamic teachings.

SLEEPING.TITLE: Sleeping & Waking
SLEEPING.DESCRIPTION: Islamic guidelines for sleep habits and morning routines.

MOSQUE.TITLE: Mosque Etiquette
MOSQUE.DESCRIPTION: Proper conduct and manners when visiting and praying in the mosque.

SOCIAL.TITLE: Social Interaction
SOCIAL.DESCRIPTION: Guidelines for interacting with others in various social situations.

ETHICS.TITLE: Islamic Ethics
ETHICS.DESCRIPTION: Study of virtuous and reprehensible character traits and their impact on individuals and society.

VIRTUES.TITLE: Virtuous Traits
VIRTUES.DESCRIPTION: Study of noble qualities such as honesty, generosity, and trustworthiness.

VICES.TITLE: Reprehensible Traits
VICES.DESCRIPTION: Understanding negative traits like lying, miserliness, and betrayal, and their consequences.

INTERACTIVE.TITLE: Interactive Learning
INTERACTIVE.DESCRIPTION: Engage with dynamic content through stories, activities, and practical examples.

COMMUNITY.TITLE: Supportive Community
COMMUNITY.DESCRIPTION: Join a community of learners for mutual support and shared growth.

PROGRESS.TITLE: Track Progress
PROGRESS.DESCRIPTION: Monitor your development through regular assessments and feedback.

FAMILY.TITLE: Family Study Option
FAMILY.DESCRIPTION: We offer the option of joint study for family members when desired, provided that students are at the same academic level

TESTIMONIALS.TITLE: What Our Students Say
TESTIMONIALS.SUBTITLE: Don't just take our word for it. See what our students have to say about their learning journey with us.
TESTIMONIALS.DESCRIPTION: Our team is dedicated to providing exceptional education and guidance that drives real results. Join hundreds of satisfied students who've experienced the difference.

1.NAME: Sarah Ahmed
1.CONTENT: The Arabic language program at Tabnyiin has been transformative. The teachers are incredibly patient and the curriculum is well-structured. I've made more progress in 6 months than I did in 2 years of self-study.

2.NAME: Mohammed Ali
2.CONTENT: Learning Quran recitation with proper tajweed has been a beautiful journey. The teachers are knowledgeable and the online platform makes it easy to practice between sessions. Highly recommended!

3.NAME: Fatima Hassan
3.CONTENT: The Islamic studies program has deepened my understanding of our faith. The teachers explain complex concepts in a way that's easy to understand, and the interactive sessions make learning engaging.

4.NAME: Ahmed Mahmoud
4.CONTENT: As a family, we've found Tabnyiin to be the perfect platform for our children's Islamic education. The family program is flexible and the teachers are excellent with kids. Our children look forward to their classes!

5.NAME: Layla Ibrahim
5.CONTENT: The advanced Arabic program has helped me achieve fluency I never thought possible. The personalized attention and structured approach have been invaluable to my learning journey.

FEATURES.METHOD: Comprehensive and adaptive curriculum based on student level
FEATURES.LEVELS: Different levels from beginner to advanced

FEATURES.METHOD: Personalized learning approach with expert teachers
FEATURES.LEVELS: From basic recitation to advanced memorization
From basic Islamic concepts to advanced studies
